name: The Sniper VR
description: Shaky hands? Hate the VR Shiver in Sniper Games? Well this game is for you! Try out our stabilization system which completely removes the VR Shiver and allows you to be a great sniper even with shaky hands!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
